head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SILLS, LEONARD H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SILLS, LEONARD H.

block.p: SILLS-Leonard H. On August 31, 2000 at age 91. Beloved husband of the late Carol Rudin Sills. Loving father of John and Richard and grandfather of Gregory. Dear uncle of Jack and Lewis Rudin, Donald Heimlich, Audrey Heard and the late Lewis Steinman and Natalie Lewin. Funeral services will be held Tuesday, September 5, 11:30 AM at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street. Interment to follow at Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, NY.
